title: Lead Murex Datamart Consultant
content:
Capco Poland is a global technology and management consultancy specializing in driving digital transformation across the financial services industry. We are passionate about helping our clients succeed in an ever-changing industry.
We also are experts in          focused on development, automation, innovation, and long-term projects in financial services. In Capco, you can code, write, create, and live at your maximum capabilities without getting dull, tired, or foggy.
Join our Core-Warsaw based-Team and help us shape the future of our Engineering Squad to the next level. Have an impact on what's next, work closely with top Capital Markerts Experts ðŸš€ Currently we are looking for a Lead Murex Datamart Consultant.
Responsibilities:
System Integration and Design:
Lead the design, development, and implementation of Murex Datamart solutions.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and analyze business requirements for data integration and reporting.
Data Management:
Oversee the extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL) processes for Murex Datamart.
Ensure the quality, accuracy, and integrity of data stored in the Datamart.
Team Leadership:
Manage and lead a team of Murex Datamart developers.
Provide guidance, support, and mentorship to team members.
Technical Expertise:
Stay abreast of the latest developments in Murex technology and related tools.
Serve as a subject matter expert for Murex Datamart, providing guidance on best practices and optimization.
Collaboration:
Work closely with business analysts, system architects, and other stakeholders to ensure alignment between business needs and technical solutions.
Performance Optimization:
Monitor and optimize the performance of Murex Datamart to meet business requirements.
Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to data integration and reporting.
Documentation:
Create and maintain technical documentation for Murex Datamart processes, configurations, and workflows.
Qualifications:
Education:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. Advanced degree is a plus.
Experience:
Several years of hands-on experience with Murex Datamart implementation and management.
Strong background in data integration, ETL processes, and data warehousing.
Technical Skills:
Proficiency in Murex, SQL, and relevant data modeling tools.
Knowledge of financial markets and instruments.
Leadership Skills:
Demonstrated leadership experience, including the ability to lead and motivate a team.
Communication:
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to effectively collaborate with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Problem-Solving:
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to troubleshoot and resolve complex issues.
WHY JOIN CAPCO?
Business to Business contract (B2B) or Employment of Contract (Umowa o pracÄ™) - you choose!
Speaking English on daily basis, mainly in contact with foreign stakeholders and peers
Multiple employee benefits packages (MyBenefit Cafeteria, private medical care, life insurance)
Access to 3.000+ Business Courses Platform (Udemy)
Paid Referral Program
Ongoing learning opportunities to help you acquire new skills or deepen existing expertise
Being part of the core squad focused on the growth of the Polish business unit
A flat, non-hierarchical structure that will enable you to work with senior partners and directly with clients
A work culture focused on innovation and creating lasting value for our clients and employees
 
ONLINE RECRUITMENT PROCESS STEPS
Screening call with the Recruiter
Technical/Competencies interview with Capco Hiring Manager
Culture fit interview
Feedback/Offer
